entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
